title: Chicken fettuccine carbonara
ingredients: ['6 mushrooms (or as many as you like)', '4 rashers streaky bacon', '1 tablespoon garlic', '1 tablespoon mustard', '3-4 chicken breast fillets, diced', '250ml soured cream', '250ml double cream', '400-500g fettuccine', 'chopped fresh chives to garnish']
